wpt.name: GC2KN3Q
wpt.desc: Tysons during the Holly-days by cphug184, Traditional Cache (1.5/1.5)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Tysons during the Holly-days
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:short_description: Nano on a street side sign.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
Simple grab- just gotta find it. This is findable in the snow and is a 24/7 cache. It is in an office park right off Rt 7. Nothing too special.
There is parking in the cul de sac nearby. You can take the sidewalk down the hill to Raglan Park for a nice walk in some woods. Walk up the hill to watch the construction of the Metro.
I confess to placing this cache to assist 366 day streakers keep going should there be snow.

groundspeak:log.groundspeak:text: Found before work on a business trip.
